attributes.action: Let the gyms open .people who have health problems . depend on the gym 100%
attributes.background: Open gym for people like me to use as I have cystic fibrosis and diabetes also asthma and    osteoporosis  and im going to be really ill soon if i don't get to the gym . Even doing 5 days a week 3 hours a time only keeps me above water.  Now its been 16 weeks

rejection.details: Since you started your petition gyms have been allowed to reopen. You can read the Government's announcement about the reopening of gyms here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-gyms-and-pools-to-reopen-safely
